allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add optimization feature and update job match to candidate perspective

Major features and improvements:
- Add resume optimization feature with structure preservation
- Add resume download functionality (DOCX/PDF export)
- Add auto-refresh for resume analysis status
- Change job match scoring from recruiter to candidate perspective
- Add comprehensive job match scoring system with detailed criteria
- Add ATS template converter for structure-preserving exports
- Add resume structure parser and validators
- Add optimization API endpoints with apply/preview functionality
- Update UI language to address users directly (you/your instead of candidate)
- Update interview recommendations to be candidate-focused
- Add experience level matching in job analysis
- Improve type definitions with optimization and structured resume types

Technical improvements:
- Add JSON schema validation for resume structure
- Add change tracking for optimization preview
- Improve error handling and logging in job matcher
- Add support for legacy field names for backwards compatibility

EOF
)")
